package one;

import java.util.HashMap;

public class Day33 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

 HashMap<String,Integer>	Students = new HashMap<>();

 Students.put("Sikshya",21);
 Students.put("Geeta", 32);
 Students.put("Shruti",38);
 Students.put("Hari",45);
 Students.put("Krishna",25);
 
 
 //Accessing the value from HashMap
 
 int p = Students.get("Geeta");
 System.out.println(p);
		
		
	//Check particular key exists	
		
		boolean x = Students.containsKey("Shruti");
		System.out.println(x);
		
		
	//total number of key value in HashMap()
		
		int k = Students.size();
		System.out.println(k);
		
	//remove the value
		
		Students.remove("Geeta");
		System.out.println(Students);
		
		
		//update the value
		
		Students.put("Hari",22);
		System.out.println(Students);
		
		
		
		//looping through HashMap
		
		for (String M :Students.keySet()) {
			System.out.println(M);
		}
		
		for(int N : Students.values()) {
			System.out.println(N);
		}
		
	}

}
